content: Bank Account Savings Asked by Martin LowAsked on 27 Apr 2019Anyone is using iSavvy Savings Plus? I don't really understand how the bonus interest works. And how it compares to CIMB Fastsaver. How does iSavvy Savings Plus compares up with Fastsaver from CIMB?1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Ang Yee Gary, Medicine at National University Of SingaporeLevel 4. ProdigyUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Https://sslsecure.maybank.com.sg/cgi-bin/mbs/JSPscripts/mbb_rates/isavvycalculator.jspYou have to keep topping up and the bonus interest is on the amount of money u top up.
Fastsaver is on the amount of money in account not just top up.If the answer is useful please up vote it.2 comments1
Martin Low28 Apr 2019But how come the bonus interest become constant amt? Not compounded?Ang Yee Gary29 Apr 2019If I am not wrong it is incremental balance that's gets the special interest rate.
